stratagems.legend: Physical barriers are no obstacle to creatures that can will their desires into being with but a twist of their supernatural powers.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.EFFECT: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem once.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effect: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem once.

stratagems.name: UNREAL SPEED
stratagems.legend: Flickering in and out of reality like the image on a faulty vid-reel, the daemons advance with terrifying supernatural swiftness.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Charge phase.TARGET: One INFANTRY LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.
stratagems.when: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One INFANTRY LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

stratagems.name: THE REALM OF CHAOS
stratagems.legend: When the energies of the warp bleed into realspace, the Legiones Daemonica can rip open portals in seeming thin-air, returning to their hellscapes only to rematerialise amidst their foes a heartbeat later.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: End of your opponent’s turn.TARGET: Up to two LEGIONES DAEMONICA units from your army that are within your army’s Shadow of Chaos, or one other LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army.EFFECT: Remove the targeted units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves. They will arrive back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase using the Deep Strike ability.RESTRICTIONS: You cannot target units that are within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units with this Stratagem.
stratagems.when: End of your opponent’s turn.
stratagems.target: Up to two LEGIONES DAEMONICA units from your army that are within your army’s Shadow of Chaos, or one other LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Remove the targeted units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves. They will arrive back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase using the Deep Strike ability.RESTRICTIONS: You cannot target units that are within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units with this Stratagem.

stratagems.name: DAEMONIC INVULNERABILITY
stratagems.legend: Daemons are madness given form. Their very bodies are fashioned from the stuff of the warp, and are difficult to destroy through conventional means.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of that enemy unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an invulnerable saving throw is made for a model in your unit, re-roll a saving throw of 1.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of that enemy unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an invulnerable saving throw is made for a model in your unit, re-roll a saving throw of 1.

stratagems.name: DRAUGHT OF TERROR
stratagems.legend: The swelling fear of their mortal prey serves as an intoxicating elixir to the daemonic followers, each draught invigorating their forms with deadly power.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of weapons equipped by models in that unit by 1. In addition, until the end of the phase, each time such a weapon targets a unit that is Battle-shocked, you can re-roll the Wound roll.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of weapons equipped by models in that unit by 1. In addition, until the end of the phase, each time such a weapon targets a unit that is Battle-shocked, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: DENIZENS OF THE WARP
stratagems.legend: Ever lurking in the warp, daemons will wait until the barriers between realms thin before tearing their way into realspace.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.EFFECT: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy models.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy models.

stratagems.name: CORRUPT REALSPACE
stratagems.legend: Daemons instinctively feel the need to despoil and corrupt every corner of realspace, the better to sustain their otherworldly forms.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of any Command phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker you control.EFFECT: That objective marker is said to be Corrupted and remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. In addition, while an objective marker is Corrupted and under your control, the area of the battlefield within 6" of that objective marker is considered to be within your army’s Shadow of Chaos.
stratagems.when: Start of any Command phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker you control.
stratagems.effect: That objective marker is said to be Corrupted and remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. In addition, while an objective marker is Corrupted and under your control, the area of the battlefield within 6" of that objective marker is considered to be within your army’s Shadow of Chaos.

stratagems.name: WARP SURGE
stratagems.legend: The winds of the warp blow strong, invigorating daemonkind and lending them supernatural speed and ferocity.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Charge phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that is within your army’s Shadow of Chaos.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.
stratagems.when: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that is within your army’s Shadow of Chaos.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

stratagems.name: SEDUCTIVE WHISPERS
stratagems.legend: In the press of combat, these daemons utter beguiling susurrations that cloud the minds of their mortal foes.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One SLAANESH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One SLAANESH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: SOPORIFIC SCENT
stratagems.legend: A cloud of sickly-sweet perfume surrounds these daemons, dulling the senses of the foe and preventing them from striking back.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One SLAANESH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, Desperate Escape tests taken for models in your unit are automatically passed and your unit does not suffer mortal wounds from the Lithe Killers Detachment rule.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One SLAANESH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, Desperate Escape tests taken for models in your unit are automatically passed and your unit does not suffer mortal wounds from the Lithe Killers Detachment rule.

stratagems.name: DANCE OF DEATH
stratagems.legend: Coiling like wind-rippled streamers between the blades of their foes, these daemons flicker momentarily out of the fray before slashing back in.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase, just after a SLAANESH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your armyFalls Back.TARGET: That SLAANESH unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after a SLAANESH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your armyFalls Back.
stratagems.target: That SLAANESH unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

stratagems.name: INSUBSTANTIAL ENTITIES
stratagems.legend: Physical barriers are no obstacle to creatures that can will their desires into being with but a twist of their supernatural powers.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One SLAANESH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.EFFECT: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem once.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One SLAANESH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effect: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem once.

stratagems.name: SWIFT AS MURDER
stratagems.legend: The very eagerness of these daemons to shed blood and reap skulls propels them all the quicker towards their foes.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, add 2" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 2" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

stratagems.name: INSUBSTANTIAL ENTITIES
stratagems.legend: Physical barriers are no obstacle to creatures that can will their desires into being with but a twist of their supernatural powers.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.EFFECT: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem once.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effect: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem once.

stratagems.name: ABJECT HORROR
stratagems.legend: Fighting for one's life against ferocious daemons of murder, tom straight from the pages of nightmare scripture, is a terrifying experience.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of the Fight phase.TARGET: One KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army.EFFECT: Each enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.
stratagems.when: Start of the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Each enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

stratagems.name: UNSTOPPABLE SLAUGHTERERS
stratagems.legend: Too furious to be halted by mortal barriers, these daemons manifest in a crimson haze beyond the hatchway, their vicious blows all too solid and real.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: One KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Select one closed Hatchway within 1" of your unit. Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to be selected to fight as if that Hatchway was open. When doing so, that unit can select targets as if that Hatchway was open (that Hatchway is only considered to be open for your unit, not for any other units).
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Select one closed Hatchway within 1" of your unit. Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to be selected to fight as if that Hatchway was open. When doing so, that unit can select targets as if that Hatchway was open (that Hatchway is only considered to be open for your unit, not for any other units).

stratagems.name: OVERWHELMING EXCESS
stratagems.type: Legion of Excess – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Sensation gushes relentlessly into the overstimulated minds of the enemy until their souls strain fit to burst. Barely able to think or function, they recoil in their desperate need to stem the unstoppable tide.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: The attacking unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result. If that test is passed, until the end of the phase, each time a model in the attacking unit makes an attack that targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. If that test is failed, in addition to being Battle-shocked, until the end of the phase, the attacking unit cannot select your unit as the target of any attacks. That unit can then select new targets for any attacks that targeted your unit.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: The attacking unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result. If that test is passed, until the end of the phase, each time a model in the attacking unit makes an attack that targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. If that test is failed, in addition to being Battle-shocked, until the end of the phase, the attacking unit cannot select your unit as the target of any attacks. That unit can then select new targets for any attacks that targeted your unit.

stratagems.name: ARCHAGONISTS
stratagems.type: Legion of Excess – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: These daemons perceive with absolute clarity whereabouts on their victims’ bodies they must strike to inflict the greatest possible excess of suffering.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH MONSTER unit or up to two LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH units (excluding MONSTERS) from your army that have not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in one of those units makes an attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH MONSTER unit or up to two LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH units (excluding MONSTERS) from your army that have not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in one of those units makes an attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: CAVALCADE OF BLADES
stratagems.type: Legion of Excess – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The cavorting approach of Slaaneshi daemons is hypnotic and enthralling. It is a whirling carousel of eye-searing colours and flashing blades that tempt mortals to reach out with trembling eagerness until they can just reach.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Charge phase, just after a LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army ends a Charge move.TARGET: That LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit.EFFECT: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit, then roll one D6 for each model in your unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit, or roll six D6 instead if your unit is a MONSTER unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
stratagems.when: Your Charge phase, just after a LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army ends a Charge move.
stratagems.target: That LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit, then roll one D6 for each model in your unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit, or roll six D6 instead if your unit is a MONSTER unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

stratagems.name: THIEVES OF PAIN
stratagems.type: Legion of Excess – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: To exist, however fleetingly, in realspace is an opportunity to indulge in every physical sensation. So enraptured do the daemons of Slaanesh become that they even steal one another’s agonies to enjoy.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Any phase, just after an attack or mortal wound is allocated to a model in a LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army (excluding MONSTERS).TARGET: That LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit.EFFECT: Select one other friendly LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit within 12" of your unit. Until the end of the phase, while the selected unit is on the battlefield, each time a model in your unit would lose a wound, inflict 1 mortal wound on the selected unit instead.
stratagems.when: Any phase, just after an attack or mortal wound is allocated to a model in a LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army (excluding MONSTERS).
stratagems.target: That LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit.
stratagems.effect: Select one other friendly LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit within 12" of your unit. Until the end of the phase, while the selected unit is on the battlefield, each time a model in your unit would lose a wound, inflict 1 mortal wound on the selected unit instead.

stratagems.name: PHANTASMAL LONGING
stratagems.type: Legion of Excess – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Against their wills, enemy combatants find themselves wishing for the daemons of Slaanesh to draw closer. It is child’s play for the daemons of Slaanesh to harness such strong emotions and transform them into manifest reality.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through terrain features.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through terrain features.

stratagems.name: SENSORY EXCRUCIATION
stratagems.type: Legion of Excess – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: This entity causes the battlefield to flicker wildly between the debauched Slaaneshi Warp interstice and the most brutally mundane reality, faster than even supernatural senses can perceive. The result is a psychically devastating barrage of excess and deprivation.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Command phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH MONSTER unit from your army that is on the battlefield.EFFECT: Each unit on the battlefield that is within your army’s Shadow of Chaos must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test if they are Below Half-strength.Designer’s Note: This Stratagem forces all friendly and enemy units alike within your army’s Shadow of Chaos to take a Battle-shock test. This can allow a Chaos Daemons player to heal units from their army through the Daemonic Terror army rule, at the risk of causing some of their own units to become Battle-shocked.
stratagems.when: Your Command phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH MONSTER unit from your army that is on the battlefield.
stratagems.effect: Each unit on the battlefield that is within your army’s Shadow of Chaos must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test if they are Below Half-strength.Designer’s Note: This Stratagem forces all friendly and enemy units alike within your army’s Shadow of Chaos to take a Battle-shock test. This can allow a Chaos Daemons player to heal units from their army through the Daemonic Terror army rule, at the risk of causing some of their own units to become Battle-shocked.

stratagems.name: FATE SYPHONING
stratagems.legend: The daemons feed upon the raw potentiality that dances around strategically pivotal locations in order to sustain their corporeal manifestations.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One TZEENTCH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker and was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, you can re-roll saving throws of 1 made for models in your unit.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One TZEENTCH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker and was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, you can re-roll saving throws of 1 made for models in your unit.

stratagems.name: ILLUSORY PRESENCE
stratagems.legend: Enemies can never truly be sure that where the y daemons of Tzeentch are is where they really are.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase, just after a TZEENTCH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army has shot.TARGET: That TZEENTCH unit.EFFECT: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6".RESTRICTIONS: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase, just after a TZEENTCH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army has shot.
stratagems.target: That TZEENTCH unit.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6".RESTRICTIONS: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

stratagems.name: FICKLE BLESSINGS
stratagems.legend: Even the daemons of Tzeentch are not immune to the fundamentally unstable nature of their own magicks, which may twist and rupture their bodies as often as they lend terrible power.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One HORRORS unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PISTOL] and [HAZARDOUS] abilities.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One HORRORS unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PISTOL] and [HAZARDOUS] abilities.

stratagems.name: INSUBSTANTIAL ENTITIES
stratagems.legend: Physical barriers are no obstacle to creatures that can will their desires into being with but a twist of their supernatural powers.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One TZEENTCH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.EFFECT: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem once.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One TZEENTCH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effect: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem once.

stratagems.name: MURKSHADOWS
stratagems.legend: With the battlefield swathed in an occluding miasma of unreality, Nurgle’s daemons may loom out of the haze, solidify from amidst thrumming fly clouds or even rise out of the filth without warning
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE INFANTRY unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal move, add 5" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE INFANTRY unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal move, add 5" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

stratagems.name: FEVER VISIONS
stratagems.legend: A plague of waking nightmares races through the enemy ranks, leaving foes reeling in the grip of nauseating visions that curdle into soul-destroying reality.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. After your unit has finished making its attacks, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks; that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. After your unit has finished making its attacks, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks; that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

stratagems.name: SEEPING VIRULENCE
stratagems.legend: Repugnant filth wells from the weapons, gaping maws and open wounds of these daemons, slopping across the foe and causing swift and virulent rot wherever it finds the slightest way in.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

stratagems.name: PLAGUE OF WOES
stratagems.legend: Even as one band of foes gives in to despair, their sorrows spread like a virus to the minds and souls of others, the enemy’s woes multiplying by the moment.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Command phase, before selecting any targets for the Melancholic Miasma Detachment rule.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, after an enemy unit takes a Battle-shock test as a result of the Melancholic Miasma Detachment rule, select one other enemy unit within 9" of your unit; that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Command phase, before selecting any targets for the Melancholic Miasma Detachment rule.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, after an enemy unit takes a Battle-shock test as a result of the Melancholic Miasma Detachment rule, select one other enemy unit within 9" of your unit; that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

stratagems.name: ROT AND RENEWAL
stratagems.legend: Rather than lumber across the battlefield, these daemons rot away to nothing before hatching anew from canker blooms wherever they wish to be.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through terrain features.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through terrain features.

stratagems.name: FOETID RESURGENCE
stratagems.legend: As the power of the Plague God saturates the battlefield, fresh daemonic life blooms from the septic corpse mulch that bubbles underfoot.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Command phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army that is on the battlefield.EFFECT: Return up to 1 destroyed model to your unit, or up to D3 destroyed models instead if your unit is a BATTLELINE unit, with their full wounds remaining. If it is a MONSTER unit, one model in your unit regains up to D3+1 lost wounds instead.
stratagems.when: Your Command phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army that is on the battlefield.
stratagems.effect: Return up to 1 destroyed model to your unit, or up to D3 destroyed models instead if your unit is a BATTLELINE unit, with their full wounds remaining. If it is a MONSTER unit, one model in your unit regains up to D3+1 lost wounds instead.

stratagems.name: FOUL RESILIENCE
stratagems.type: Rotten and Rusted – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: So full of repulsive vitality are these daemons that their corporeal forms must be absolutely destroyed before they halt their advance.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One NURGLE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army (excluding NURGLINGS units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One NURGLE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army (excluding NURGLINGS units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

stratagems.name: INSUBSTANTIAL ENTITIES
stratagems.type: Rotten and Rusted – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Physical barriers are no obstacle to creatures that can will their desires into being with but a twist of their supernatural powers.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One NURGLE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.EFFECT: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem once.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One NURGLE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effect: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem once.

stratagems.name: GLEEFUL INVASION
stratagems.type: Rotten and Rusted – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Infesting every corridor and duct, Nurglings move in giggling, farting swarms whose capering peregrinations are impossible to predict.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has shot or fought.TARGET: One NURGLINGS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one of more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Your unit can make a Normal or Fall Back move of up to D6".
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has shot or fought.
stratagems.target: One NURGLINGS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one of more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Normal or Fall Back move of up to D6".

stratagems.name: SICKLY CONTAMINANTS
stratagems.type: Rotten and Rusted – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The filth that slops from these entities' wounds taints strategic locations in the Plague God's name.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: End of the Fight phase, or your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One NURGLE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army. If this Stratagem is used in your opponent’s Shooting phase, it must target a unit that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Select one objective marker your unit is within range of. Your unit suffers D3 mortal wounds and that objective marker is Secured by your army. If your unit is a PLAGUEBEARERS unit, it only suffers 1 mortal wound, instead of D3.
stratagems.when: End of the Fight phase, or your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One NURGLE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army. If this Stratagem is used in your opponent’s Shooting phase, it must target a unit that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Select one objective marker your unit is within range of. Your unit suffers D3 mortal wounds and that objective marker is Secured by your army. If your unit is a PLAGUEBEARERS unit, it only suffers 1 mortal wound, instead of D3.

stratagems.name: PYROGENESIS
stratagems.legend: Warpflame is as changeable as the monsters who wield it, capable of easily burning through ceramite plates or reinforced hulls when desired.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight that phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Strength characteristic of weapons equipped by models in your unit, or spend one Flux token and add 3 to the Strength characteristic of those weapons and improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of those weapons by 1 instead.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight that phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Strength characteristic of weapons equipped by models in your unit, or spend one Flux token and add 3 to the Strength characteristic of those weapons and improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of those weapons by 1 instead.

stratagems.name: DELIRIUM UNMADE
stratagems.legend: Between one heartbeat and the next, the daemons of Tzeentch vanish as though they were never there. Yet this jarring respite will last only long enough for their victims to question their sanity before the onslaught begins anew.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units. Alternatively, you can spend one Flux token when you use this Stratagem and target up to two LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH units from your army instead (including those within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units).EFFECT: Remove your units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.
stratagems.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units. Alternatively, you can spend one Flux token when you use this Stratagem and target up to two LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH units from your army instead (including those within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units).
stratagems.effect: Remove your units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.

stratagems.name: FICKLEFIRE
stratagems.legend: These daemons care little for who they engulf in their infernal fires, only that destruction and chaos are wrought.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, enemy units are not considered to be within Engagement Range of your unit for the purposes of selecting targets for, and resolving attacks with, ranged weapons. Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model is destroyed while its unit is within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6: on a 5+, your unit suffers 1 mortal wound after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, enemy units are not considered to be within Engagement Range of your unit for the purposes of selecting targets for, and resolving attacks with, ranged weapons. Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model is destroyed while its unit is within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6: on a 5+, your unit suffers 1 mortal wound after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks.

stratagems.name: IMPOSSIBLE ECLIPSE
stratagems.legend: At the call of this malevolent entity, invisible stellar bodies slide into alignment, plunging the battlefield into momentary twilight, dancing with strange and sorcerous will-o’-the-wisps.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Any phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH MONSTER unit from your army that is on the battlefield.EFFECT: Select No Man’s Land or your opponent’s deployment zone, or spend one Flux token and select both. Until the end of the phase, the selected areas of the battlefield are within your army’s Shadow of Chaos.
stratagems.when: Any phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH MONSTER unit from your army that is on the battlefield.
stratagems.effect: Select No Man’s Land or your opponent’s deployment zone, or spend one Flux token and select both. Until the end of the phase, the selected areas of the battlefield are within your army’s Shadow of Chaos.

stratagems.name: FLICKERING REALITY
stratagems.legend: The very stuff of reality flickers like a candle flame in a gale, frustrating even the most skilful sworders as they strike at rippling illusions.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Roll one D6, then you can spend one Flux token to re-roll the result: until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, on an unmodified Hit roll (after any re-roll) of that result, the attack sequence ends, even if the original Hit roll would have been a Critical Hit.Example: If you roll a 2 and choose to spend one Flux token to re-roll the result, and the re-roll is a 6, then until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, on an unmodified Hit roll of 6 the attack sequence ends, that attack fails to hit and no Critical Hit effects (e.g. Lethal Hits) are resolved.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Roll one D6, then you can spend one Flux token to re-roll the result: until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, on an unmodified Hit roll (after any re-roll) of that result, the attack sequence ends, even if the original Hit roll would have been a Critical Hit.Example: If you roll a 2 and choose to spend one Flux token to re-roll the result, and the re-roll is a 6, then until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, on an unmodified Hit roll of 6 the attack sequence ends, that attack fails to hit and no Critical Hit effects (e.g. Lethal Hits) are resolved.

stratagems.name: FATEBORNE NIGHTMARES
stratagems.legend: Barred doors, reinforced windows, or walls are no barriers to the children of the Warp. They cannot be outrun; they cannot be hidden from; they cannot be stopped.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through terrain features.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through terrain features.

stratagems.name: SHEATHED IN BRASS
stratagems.legend: The scorn of these daemons for the blasts and blades of the weakling foe manifests as flowing brass armour that enfolds their corporeal forms and denies all but the most dolorous blows.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a Save characteristic of 3+.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a Save characteristic of 3+.

stratagems.name: BLOOD BEGETS SKULLS
stratagems.legend: The iron reek of mortal blood pulsing through living veins fires the unnatural senses of Khorne’s daemons, drawing them on all the swifter to tear, slay, and hack skulls from necks for mighty Khorne.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Charge phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army that has not been selected to charge this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.
stratagems.when: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army that has not been selected to charge this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

stratagems.name: SKULLS BEGET BLOOD
stratagems.legend: Torn from the wet and ragged necks of worthy mortal champions, these skulls blaze with balefire as the daemons of Khorne heft and hurl them. They explode amongst the foe to shed more blood for the Blood God.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE INFANTRY or LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE MOUNTED unit from your army (excluding units that Fell Back this turn) that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.EFFECT: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of one or more units from your army and is within 8" of and visible to your unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE INFANTRY or LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE MOUNTED unit from your army (excluding units that Fell Back this turn) that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of one or more units from your army and is within 8" of and visible to your unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

stratagems.name: GORE‑HUNGRY ONSLAUGHT
stratagems.legend: The manifest will to run down and slaughter their prey allows the daemons of Khorne to surge through physical barriers as though they did not exist, falling upon their victims like bloody phantasms.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through terrain features.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through terrain features.

stratagems.name: WRATH UNDENIABLE
stratagems.legend: Even the banishing blow is often not enough to prevent the daemons of Khorne from lashing out to take bloody vengeance as they discorporate.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed by a melee attack, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed by a melee attack, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.name: FOOLS’ FLIGHT
stratagems.legend: Khorne’s daemons know only hatred and contempt for those who flee from combat and will distort reality itself to keep such cowards trapped in the endless battle they sought to escape.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit Falls Back.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit.EFFECT: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge. Note that even if that charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit Falls Back.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit.
stratagems.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge. Note that even if that charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

abilities.name: Murdercall
abilities.legend: The daemons of Khorne are physical manifestations of rage, hate and the desperate need to shed blood. For as long as their physical forms remain in realspace, they will never cease their murderous rampage.
abilities.rawDescription: Each time an enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT) ends a Normal or Advance move within 6" of one or more LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE units from your army, one of those LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE units can make a Surge move towards that enemy unit. To do so, roll one D6: models in your unit move a number of inches up to this result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to that enemy unit. When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit. A unit cannot make a Surge move while it is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
abilities.formattedDescription: Each time an enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT) ends a Normal or Advance move within 6" of one or more LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE units from your army, one of those LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE units can make a Surge move towards that enemy unit. To do so, roll one D6: models in your unit move a number of inches up to this result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to that enemy unit. When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit. A unit cannot make a Surge move while it is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

abilities.name: Blood Tainted
abilities.legend: Lifeblood spilt by the daemons of Khorne is tainted by their infernal touch, staining the ground dark with murder.
abilities.rawDescription: At the end of a phase in which a LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army destroyed an enemy unit that was within range of an objective marker at the start of the phase, if your unit has a higher Level of Control over that objective marker, that objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.
abilities.formattedDescription: At the end of a phase in which a LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army destroyed an enemy unit that was within range of an objective marker at the start of the phase, if your unit has a higher Level of Control over that objective marker, that objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

stratagems.name: INCORPOREAL TERRORS
stratagems.legend: Even as enemy fire whips towards them, the daemons simply cease to inhabit corporeal space for a flickerbeat before solidifying once more.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: PARTING BLOWS
stratagems.legend: Able to manifest with particular vehemence within these warp-cursed corridors, the daemons hold their corporeal forms together long enough to strike at those who banish them.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. That destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. That destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.name: INSUBSTANTIAL ENTITIES
stratagems.legend: Physical barriers are no obstacle to creatures that can will their desires into being with but a twist of their supernatural powers.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.EFFECT: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem once.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effect: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem once.

stratagems.name: UNREAL SPEED
stratagems.legend: Flickering in and out of reality like the image on a faulty vid-reel, the daemons advance with terrifying supernatural swiftness.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Charge phase.TARGET: One INFANTRY LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.
stratagems.when: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One INFANTRY LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

stratagems.name: THE REALM OF CHAOS
stratagems.legend: When the energies of the warp bleed into realspace, the Legiones Daemonica can rip open portals in seeming thin-air, returning to their hellscapes only to rematerialise amidst their foes a heartbeat later.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: End of your opponent’s turn.TARGET: Up to two LEGIONES DAEMONICA units from your army that are within your army’s Shadow of Chaos, or one other LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army.EFFECT: Remove the targeted units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves. They will arrive back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase using the Deep Strike ability.RESTRICTIONS: You cannot target units that are within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units with this Stratagem.
stratagems.when: End of your opponent’s turn.
stratagems.target: Up to two LEGIONES DAEMONICA units from your army that are within your army’s Shadow of Chaos, or one other LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Remove the targeted units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves. They will arrive back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase using the Deep Strike ability.RESTRICTIONS: You cannot target units that are within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units with this Stratagem.

stratagems.name: DAEMONIC INVULNERABILITY
stratagems.legend: Daemons are madness given form. Their very bodies are fashioned from the stuff of the warp, and are difficult to destroy through conventional means.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of that enemy unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an invulnerable saving throw is made for a model in your unit, re-roll a saving throw of 1.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of that enemy unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an invulnerable saving throw is made for a model in your unit, re-roll a saving throw of 1.

stratagems.name: DRAUGHT OF TERROR
stratagems.legend: The swelling fear of their mortal prey serves as an intoxicating elixir to the daemonic followers, each draught invigorating their forms with deadly power.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of weapons equipped by models in that unit by 1. In addition, until the end of the phase, each time such a weapon targets a unit that is Battle-shocked, you can re-roll the Wound roll.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of weapons equipped by models in that unit by 1. In addition, until the end of the phase, each time such a weapon targets a unit that is Battle-shocked, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: DENIZENS OF THE WARP
stratagems.legend: Ever lurking in the warp, daemons will wait until the barriers between realms thin before tearing their way into realspace.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.EFFECT: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy models.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy models.

stratagems.name: CORRUPT REALSPACE
stratagems.legend: Daemons instinctively feel the need to despoil and corrupt every corner of realspace, the better to sustain their otherworldly forms.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of any Command phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker you control.EFFECT: That objective marker is said to be Corrupted and remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. In addition, while an objective marker is Corrupted and under your control, the area of the battlefield within 6" of that objective marker is considered to be within your army’s Shadow of Chaos.
stratagems.when: Start of any Command phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker you control.
stratagems.effect: That objective marker is said to be Corrupted and remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. In addition, while an objective marker is Corrupted and under your control, the area of the battlefield within 6" of that objective marker is considered to be within your army’s Shadow of Chaos.

stratagems.name: WARP SURGE
stratagems.legend: The winds of the warp blow strong, invigorating daemonkind and lending them supernatural speed and ferocity.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Charge phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that is within your army’s Shadow of Chaos.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.
stratagems.when: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that is within your army’s Shadow of Chaos.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

abilities.name: Warp Rifts
abilities.legend: Daemonic legions tear through the fabric of realspace, malevolent entities flickering into being like phantasms from a nightmare. Worse still, as terror and panic take hold of their victims, so their mortal souls become ever easier prey for the entities pouring through from the warp.
abilities.rawDescription: Each time a LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army is set up on the battlefield using the Deep Strike ability, if it is set up wholly within your army’s Shadow of Chaos, and/or if it is set up wholly within 6" of one or more friendly BLOODTHIRSTER, GREAT UNCLEAN ONE, KAIROS FATEWEAVER, KEEPER OF SECRETS, LORD OF CHANGE, ROTIGUS, SHALAXI HELBANE or SKARBRAND units with which it shares the KHORNE, TZEENTCH, NURGLE or SLAANESH keyword, it can be set up anywhere that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy models, instead of more than 9".
abilities.formattedDescription: Each time a LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army is set up on the battlefield using the Deep Strike ability, if it is set up wholly within your army’s Shadow of Chaos, and/or if it is set up wholly within 6" of one or more friendly BLOODTHIRSTER, GREAT UNCLEAN ONE, KAIROS FATEWEAVER, KEEPER OF SECRETS, LORD OF CHANGE, ROTIGUS, SHALAXI HELBANE or SKARBRAND units with which it shares the KHORNE, TZEENTCH, NURGLE or SLAANESH keyword, it can be set up anywhere that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy models, instead of more than 9".

abilities.name: Unnatural Energies
abilities.legend: Infernal power pours into the breached voidship like a floodtide, allowing the warp entities to reshape the rapidly denaturing stuff of reality itself to their whims.
abilities.rawDescription: LEGIONES DAEMONICA units from your army can perform one of the following Tactical Manoeuvres in a turn in which they Advanced or Fell Back: Secure Site; Set To Defend; Set Overwatch.
abilities.formattedDescription: LEGIONES DAEMONICA units from your army can perform one of the following Tactical Manoeuvres in a turn in which they Advanced or Fell Back: Secure Site; Set To Defend; Set Overwatch.

stratagems.name: SEDUCTIVE WHISPERS
stratagems.legend: In the press of combat, these daemons utter beguiling susurrations that cloud the minds of their mortal foes.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One SLAANESH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One SLAANESH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: SOPORIFIC SCENT
stratagems.legend: A cloud of sickly-sweet perfume surrounds these daemons, dulling the senses of the foe and preventing them from striking back.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One SLAANESH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, Desperate Escape tests taken for models in your unit are automatically passed and your unit does not suffer mortal wounds from the Lithe Killers Detachment rule.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One SLAANESH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, Desperate Escape tests taken for models in your unit are automatically passed and your unit does not suffer mortal wounds from the Lithe Killers Detachment rule.

stratagems.name: DANCE OF DEATH
stratagems.legend: Coiling like wind-rippled streamers between the blades of their foes, these daemons flicker momentarily out of the fray before slashing back in.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase, just after a SLAANESH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your armyFalls Back.TARGET: That SLAANESH unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after a SLAANESH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your armyFalls Back.
stratagems.target: That SLAANESH unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

stratagems.name: INSUBSTANTIAL ENTITIES
stratagems.legend: Physical barriers are no obstacle to creatures that can will their desires into being with but a twist of their supernatural powers.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One SLAANESH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.EFFECT: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem once.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One SLAANESH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effect: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem once.

abilities.name: Lithe Killers
abilities.legend: The daemons of Slaanesh move with an unsettling grace, dancing through the blades and guns of their foes with a supernatural agility.
abilities.rawDescription: Each time a SLAANESH INFANTRY LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, models in that unit can move through other models as if they were not there. When doing so, for each SLAANESH model that moves through one or more enemy models, roll one D6: on a 1-2, that models unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
abilities.formattedDescription: Each time a SLAANESH INFANTRY LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, models in that unit can move through other models as if they were not there. When doing so, for each SLAANESH model that moves through one or more enemy models, roll one D6: on a 1-2, that models unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

stratagems.name: SWIFT AS MURDER
stratagems.legend: The very eagerness of these daemons to shed blood and reap skulls propels them all the quicker towards their foes.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, add 2" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 2" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

stratagems.name: INSUBSTANTIAL ENTITIES
stratagems.legend: Physical barriers are no obstacle to creatures that can will their desires into being with but a twist of their supernatural powers.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.EFFECT: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem once.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effect: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem once.

stratagems.name: ABJECT HORROR
stratagems.legend: Fighting for one's life against ferocious daemons of murder, tom straight from the pages of nightmare scripture, is a terrifying experience.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of the Fight phase.TARGET: One KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army.EFFECT: Each enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.
stratagems.when: Start of the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Each enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

stratagems.name: UNSTOPPABLE SLAUGHTERERS
stratagems.legend: Too furious to be halted by mortal barriers, these daemons manifest in a crimson haze beyond the hatchway, their vicious blows all too solid and real.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: One KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Select one closed Hatchway within 1" of your unit. Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to be selected to fight as if that Hatchway was open. When doing so, that unit can select targets as if that Hatchway was open (that Hatchway is only considered to be open for your unit, not for any other units).
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Select one closed Hatchway within 1" of your unit. Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to be selected to fight as if that Hatchway was open. When doing so, that unit can select targets as if that Hatchway was open (that Hatchway is only considered to be open for your unit, not for any other units).

abilities.name: Brutal Entrance
abilities.legend: Obstructing hatches are smashed open by the rampaging daemons, some simply dissolving into molten metal or bursting apart in blood-wet showers.
abilities.rawDescription: Each time a KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army opens a Hatchway, until the end of the battle, that Hatchway cannot be closed. In addition, until the end of the turn, each time that unit declares a charge, if every target of that charge is on the opposite side of that Hatchway from your unit, add 1 to the Charge roll.
abilities.formattedDescription: Each time a KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army opens a Hatchway, until the end of the battle, that Hatchway cannot be closed. In addition, until the end of the turn, each time that unit declares a charge, if every target of that charge is on the opposite side of that Hatchway from your unit, add 1 to the Charge roll.

stratagems.name: OVERWHELMING EXCESS
stratagems.type: Legion of Excess – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Sensation gushes relentlessly into the overstimulated minds of the enemy until their souls strain fit to burst. Barely able to think or function, they recoil in their desperate need to stem the unstoppable tide.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: The attacking unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result. If that test is passed, until the end of the phase, each time a model in the attacking unit makes an attack that targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. If that test is failed, in addition to being Battle-shocked, until the end of the phase, the attacking unit cannot select your unit as the target of any attacks. That unit can then select new targets for any attacks that targeted your unit.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: The attacking unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result. If that test is passed, until the end of the phase, each time a model in the attacking unit makes an attack that targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. If that test is failed, in addition to being Battle-shocked, until the end of the phase, the attacking unit cannot select your unit as the target of any attacks. That unit can then select new targets for any attacks that targeted your unit.

stratagems.name: ARCHAGONISTS
stratagems.type: Legion of Excess – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: These daemons perceive with absolute clarity whereabouts on their victims’ bodies they must strike to inflict the greatest possible excess of suffering.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH MONSTER unit or up to two LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH units (excluding MONSTERS) from your army that have not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in one of those units makes an attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH MONSTER unit or up to two LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH units (excluding MONSTERS) from your army that have not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in one of those units makes an attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: CAVALCADE OF BLADES
stratagems.type: Legion of Excess – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The cavorting approach of Slaaneshi daemons is hypnotic and enthralling. It is a whirling carousel of eye-searing colours and flashing blades that tempt mortals to reach out with trembling eagerness until they can just reach.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Charge phase, just after a LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army ends a Charge move.TARGET: That LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit.EFFECT: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit, then roll one D6 for each model in your unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit, or roll six D6 instead if your unit is a MONSTER unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
stratagems.when: Your Charge phase, just after a LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army ends a Charge move.
stratagems.target: That LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit, then roll one D6 for each model in your unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit, or roll six D6 instead if your unit is a MONSTER unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

stratagems.name: THIEVES OF PAIN
stratagems.type: Legion of Excess – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: To exist, however fleetingly, in realspace is an opportunity to indulge in every physical sensation. So enraptured do the daemons of Slaanesh become that they even steal one another’s agonies to enjoy.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Any phase, just after an attack or mortal wound is allocated to a model in a LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army (excluding MONSTERS).TARGET: That LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit.EFFECT: Select one other friendly LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit within 12" of your unit. Until the end of the phase, while the selected unit is on the battlefield, each time a model in your unit would lose a wound, inflict 1 mortal wound on the selected unit instead.
stratagems.when: Any phase, just after an attack or mortal wound is allocated to a model in a LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army (excluding MONSTERS).
stratagems.target: That LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit.
stratagems.effect: Select one other friendly LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit within 12" of your unit. Until the end of the phase, while the selected unit is on the battlefield, each time a model in your unit would lose a wound, inflict 1 mortal wound on the selected unit instead.

stratagems.name: PHANTASMAL LONGING
stratagems.type: Legion of Excess – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Against their wills, enemy combatants find themselves wishing for the daemons of Slaanesh to draw closer. It is child’s play for the daemons of Slaanesh to harness such strong emotions and transform them into manifest reality.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.TARGET: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through terrain features.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through terrain features.

stratagems.name: SENSORY EXCRUCIATION
stratagems.type: Legion of Excess – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
